title: Constructivist Online Elementary Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and experience with online tools
context.additional_context: Flexible real-time session operations for working professionals and emphasis on learner-centered engagement activities

learning_goals: Learners can design online language education modules applying constructivist instructional methods
Learners can plan student-centered activities (discussions, projects) using real-time collaboration tools
Learners can monitor learner progress and engagement by designing formative assessment strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
